    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1636</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">lord of the flies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lord der Fliegen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">seigneur des mouches</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">senhor das moscas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">signore dei mosche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λόρδος των μυγών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">señor de las moscas</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In his lesson the pupils will be able to enhance their real world vocabulary and broaden their horizons.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lord of the flies</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In seiner Lektion können die Pupillen, ihren 
realen Weltwortschatz zu erhöhen und ihre Horizonte zu erweitern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans sa leçon les pupilles pourront mettre en 
valeur leur vrai vocabulaire du monde et élargir leurs horizons.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em sua lição as pupilas poderão  realçar seu 
vocabulário real do mundo e broaden seus horizontes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nella sua lezione le pupille potranno aumentare il
loro vocabolario reale del mondo ed estendere i loro orizzonti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στο μάθημά του οι μαθητές θα είναι σε θέση να 
ενισχύσουν το πραγματικό παγκόσμιο λεξιλόγιό τους και να 
διευρύνουν τους ορίζοντές τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En su lección las pupilas podrán realzar su 
vocabulario verdadero del mundo y ensanchar sus horizontes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
